text: Vorpommern-Rügen is a district in the north of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany. The Western Pomerania Lagoon Area National Park and Jasmund National Park are in the district. The largest island in Germany, Rügen, is also in the district. The district has a number of lakes, which include: Lake Name Elevation Surface Area Günzer See Nonnensee Prohner Stausee Pütter See Schmachter See Selliner See (Rügen) ==Towns and municipalities== Amt-free towns Amt-free municipalities # Grimmen # Marlow # Putbus # Sassnitz # Stralsund # Binz # Süderholz # Zingst Ämter Ämter Ämter *1.
